item.title: Chicken kebab
item.description: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients (except the pineapple) with the chicken. Let it marinate for 1 hour. Skewer the chicken onto a wooden stick. Place a layer of pineapple on a baking tray and place the skewer on top of it. Bake at 200¬∞C (390¬∞F) for 60-90 minutes, turning it halfway through. Scile into the chicken. Serve the chicken in pita bread or on a plate with your favourite sides.

item.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
item.description: Cook the rice. Cut the chicken breast into pieces and saut√© with salt and pepper. Add the cream cheese, Greek yogurt, and a bit of tomato paste, and mix well. Add sweet or spicy paprika, garlic and onion powder, a generous amount of curry, a pinch of cumin, and food coloring (optional). Mix until it reduces slightly. From Instagram @ugar90.

item.title: KFC-style chicken nuggets
item.description: Cut the chicken breasts into medium-large cubes or strips and place them in a bowl. Add the oil, yogurt, and spices. Stir and let marinate for 30 minutes. Coat each piece in flour, then in beaten egg, and finally in crushed cornflakes (in that order). Place them on a baking tray lined with baking paper and cook at 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 20 minutes, or in an Airfryer. Serve with sauce.
